attributes.action: Ignore and condemn the petition "ban the practising of the Muslim faith in the United Kingdom."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the petition on this website "ban the practising of the Muslim faith in the United Kingdom." does not represent the views of the vast majority of people of the United Kingdom.

We support the practice of the Muslim faith, whilst condemning the atrocities commited in the name of Islam. We welcome the contribution made by Muslims to the United Kingdom, and call on the prime minister to recognise these contributions by ignoring and condemning the aforementioned petition.
